groupdesc: You can set here style for blog pages and pages.

fields.name: postmeta_author_state
fields.label: Author in post meta data
fields.tooltip: If you would like to display the Author along with your post meta data, enable this setting

fields.name: postmeta_category_state
fields.label: Category in post meta data
fields.tooltip: If you would like to display the Category along with your post meta data, enable this setting

fields.name: postmeta_coments_state
fields.label: Comments link in post meta data
fields.tooltip: If you would like to display the Number of Comments along with your post meta data, enable this setting

fields.name: archive_title_state
fields.label: Archive Category title
fields.tooltip: Here you can enable or disable displaying of the page title ie. 'Category : ...', 'Archive for ...' etc.

fields.name: feed_title_state
fields.label: Post titles in feed
fields.tooltip: Here you can enable or disable displaying of the post titles in feed.

fields.name: single_post_title_state
fields.label: Single post title
fields.tooltip: Here you can enable or disable displaying of the post title in single post view. If disabled will be displyed only title in post header area as big title.

fields.name: search_in_header_state
fields.label: Search field in header area
fields.tooltip: Here you can enable or disable displaying of search field in header area.

fields.name: excerpt_length
fields.label: Excerpt length in words
fields.tooltip: Here you can set custom excerpt length. By default in Wordpress it is 55 words.

fields.name: portfolio_items_per_page
fields.label: Portfolio items per page
fields.tooltip: Here you can set how many portfolio items will be displayed on one page in portfolio view. By default it is 10 items.

fields.name: portfolio_default_page
fields.label: Portfolio page default link
fields.tooltip: Here you can set portfolio page default link. It is used as return URL for single protfolio view. If you leave it blank link to default portfolio view in single item portfolio view will be not displayed.

fields.name: contact_template_email
fields.label: Contact e-mail
fields.tooltip: Specifies e-mail used on the Contact page template
